statements: SELECT * FROM CloudComputingOptimization;
SELECT query_name, query_complexity, optimization_strategy FROM CloudComputingOptimization;
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingOptimization WHERE query_complexity='High';
SELECT query_name, optimization_strategy FROM CloudComputingOptimization ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT workload_distribution FROM CloudComputingOptimization;
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingOptimization WHERE query_name = 'Data Preprocessing' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, query_name, query_complexity FROM CloudComputingOptimization WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Query Rewriting' ORDER BY query_complexity ASC;
SELECT query_name, workload_distribution FROM CloudComputingOptimization WHERE query_complexity = 'High' AND workload_distribution = 'Skewed' ORDER BY query_name;
SELECT query_name, workload_distribution, optimization_strategy FROM CloudComputingOptimization WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Indexing' AND query_complexity = 'Low';
SELECT id, query_name, query_complexity, workload_distribution, optimization_strategy FROM CloudComputingOptimization WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM cloud_environment;
SELECT environment_name, region FROM cloud_environment WHERE environment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM query_optimization WHERE execution_time_ms > 1000;
SELECT query_id, query_description FROM query_optimization WHERE optimization_strategy = 'index';
SELECT environment_name, region, workload_distribution FROM cloud_environment ORDER BY environment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_environment WHERE region = 'us-west' ORDER BY environment_name DESC;
SELECT environment_name, region FROM cloud_environment WHERE environment_name LIKE '%prod%' AND workload_distribution = 'high' ORDER BY environment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_environment WHERE workload_distribution = 'low' AND region = 'us-east' ORDER BY environment_id DESC;
SELECT query_description, optimization_strategy, execution_time_ms FROM query_optimization WHERE execution_time_ms > 1000 ORDER BY optimization_strategy ASC;
SELECT environment_name, region, workload_distribution FROM cloud_environment WHERE region = 'us-west' OR region = 'us-east' ORDER BY environment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_workloads WHERE id = 1;
SELECT workload_name, workload_type FROM cloud_workloads WHERE workload_type = 'Data Processing';
SELECT instance_type, cpu_count, memory_gb FROM compute_instances WHERE memory_gb >= 16;
SELECT * FROM cloud_workloads ORDER BY workload_name DESC;
SELECT workload_name, workload_description FROM cloud_workloads WHERE workload_name LIKE 'App%';
SELECT * FROM cloud_workloads WHERE workload_type = 'data processing' ORDER BY workload_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT workload_name, workload_description FROM cloud_workloads WHERE id = 3
SELECT instance_type, cpu_count, memory_gb FROM compute_instances WHERE status = 'running' ORDER BY memory_gb DESC
SELECT * FROM workload_distribution WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY workload_id, end_time

SELECT workload_name, workload_type, instance_type FROM cloud_workloads JOIN workload_distribution ON cloud_workloads.id = workload_distribution.workload_id JOIN compute_instances ON workload_distribution.instance_id = compute_instances.instance_id
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT provider_name, region FROM cloud_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT vm_id, vm_name, cpu_cores FROM virtual_machines WHERE cpu_cores >= 4;
SELECT query_id, query_text, execution_count FROM queries WHERE execution_count > 1000 ORDER BY last_executed_at DESC;
SELECT provider_name, region, COUNT(*) AS total_vms FROM cloud_providers INNER JOIN virtual_machines ON cloud_providers.provider_id = virtual_machines.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, region;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE region = 'us-west-1';
SELECT vm_name, cpu_cores, memory_gb FROM virtual_machines WHERE cpu_cores > 4;
SELECT query_type, execution_time_ms FROM workload WHERE execution_time_ms > 1000 ORDER BY execution_time_ms DESC;
SELECT query_text, execution_count FROM queries WHERE execution_count > 50 ORDER BY execution_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers JOIN virtual_machines ON cloud_providers.provider_id = virtual_machines.provider_id WHERE cloud_providers.provider_name = 'AWS';
SELECT * FROM cloud_computing_nodes;
SELECT node_name, node_status FROM cloud_computing_nodes ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM computational_workloads WHERE workload_name LIKE 'Batch%';
SELECT workload_name, COUNT(*) FROM computational_workloads GROUP BY workload_name;
SELECT node_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM cloud_computing_nodes JOIN node_metrics ON cloud_computing_nodes.node_id = node_metrics.node_id;
SELECT node_name, node_status FROM cloud_computing_nodes ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM computational_workloads WHERE workload_name LIKE '%processing%';
SELECT node_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM cloud_computing_nodes JOIN node_metrics ON cloud_computing_nodes.node_id = node_metrics.node_id;
SELECT workload_name, COUNT(*) AS num_executions FROM computational_workloads JOIN query_executions ON computational_workloads.workload_id = query_executions.workload_id GROUP BY workload_name;
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_value, MIN(metric_value) AS min_value FROM workload_metrics;
